HEADLINES: Using Virtual Reality to Create a New Corporate Headquarters
SoftBank and Fund to Invest $4.4 Billion in WeWork

SEC filings-Highlights:
1. Revenue for fiscal year 2019 increased 21% year over year
2. Gaming revenue was $6.25 billion, up 13% from a year ago driven by growth in gaming GPUs. 
3. Professional visualization revenue was $1.13 billion, up 21% from a year earlier driven by strength across both desktop and mobile workstation products.
4. Datacenter revenue was $2.93 billion, up 52% from a year ago.
5. Automotive revenue of $641 million was up 15% from a year earlier.
6. OEM and IP revenue was $767 million, down 1% from a year ago.

7. Operating expenses increased for fiscal year 2024, driven by growth in employees and compensation increases.
